00031 inline CSectionBlocker::CSectionBlocker(const isys::ICriticalSection* sectionPtr)
00032 :      m_sectionPtr(sectionPtr)
00033 {
00034        I_ASSERT(m_sectionPtr != NULL);
00035        if (m_sectionPtr != NULL){
00036               (const_cast<isys::ICriticalSection*>(m_sectionPtr))->Enter();
00037        }
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 inline CSectionBlocker::~CSectionBlocker()
00042 {
00043        Reset();
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 inline void CSectionBlocker::Reset()
00048 {      
00049        if (m_sectionPtr != NULL){
00050               (const_cast<isys::ICriticalSection*>(m_sectionPtr))->Leave();
00051        }
00052 
00053        m_sectionPtr = NULL;
00054 }
